12.content: Okay, let's have some fun with a preggo Lisa! An here are some concepts
12.title: Pregnancy

122.content:
Giving a soft yawn, Lisa climbed into her bed as it was another tiresome day for her. Specially having to deal with her brothers antics, but hey least now she could take it easy and relax. This wasn't exactly how she planned to start her summer, specially since mom and dad went away (something about a family gathering on Marges side), an now she was stuck with Bart whom she kinda had to babysit. Still, it could have been worse, least Bart wasn't trying to be a bigger douche than he usually was, so there was a plus in that.

However, just as Lisa was about to close her eyes suddenly a bright flash hit her eyes and practically blinded her. Yelping, she covered her eyes as she felt her body being lifted out of bed and flown towards the window. Gasping, the girl flailed her arms and struggled to grab something but soon found herself outside and sucked up into what seemed like a UFO. Another flash occurred, blinding the girl while a strange sound assaulted her ears knocking her out in the process.

As came to her senses, she found herself on a spaceship, strapped to a table with her nightgown cut open right where her belly was. Around her, she saw figures looming, but couldn't really tell how they looked because the bright light made everything seem blurry. Then, she heard what sounded like a drill sound as she noticed something descended from a ceiling, it did indeed look like a drill as it began to drill right into her belly button. Gasping, Lisa struggled to escape, but it was fruitless, as another device then came down resembling something of a pump with a suction cup attached to it. Attaching itself to Lisa's belly, she heard a soft hiss escape from it as she then saw her stomach was starting to grow and rise right before her eyes. The sight was too much as Lisa passed out again.

The sound of her alarm clock made the girl wake up as she sat up, rubbing her head and looking around.

"Whew...It was all a dream..." She said, then felt how she felt oddly heavy.

Getting out of bed, Lisa looked at her reflection and froze. She saw herself, but only thing that stood out is that she sported a very heavy and swollen looking belly! Infact, it made it seemed like she swallowed maybe two watermelons in one gulp! Lisa gulped, her hand slooowly running across her firm gut, confirming that it was indeed real and not part of her imagination.
122.title: Alien impregnation

1222.content:
"i'm...I'm so big and round..." Lisa whispered, her hands slowly travelling across her swollen and heavy tum "Mmm..S-Soo firm~"

Blushing softly, the girl kept rubbing her belly as she posed before the mirror by arching her back to make her orb seem bigger. She should have been freaking out, but well the fact she was knocked up by aliens was a great scientific discovery! If she showed this to the science community, she might get awards or money even! Giggling at the thought of becoming rich and popular, Lisa patted her gravid tum softly.

"Oooo! This is gonna be soo good~" She murmured, opening the door
1222.title: She's amazed

choices: Candy (Whose belly WOULDN'T grow from that?)
13.content: Now THIS is a pretty big choice. What could Lisa eat that makes her grow from eating so much?
13.title: Weight Gain

131.content:
Lisa was sitting in her desk, just an average school day. But today was different, today Lisa was going to go to a day-long trip to the Candy Factory. There, they made all types of delicious sweets: Chocolate Bars, Ice Cream, Lollipops, and all kinds of things to satisfy your stomach.

Lisa was just thinking about all the kinds of candy there, hoping she'd be able to take advantage of this, and eat all the candy she can. Ms. Hoover walked in, and told the class to walk outside to the bus for the ride to the Factory.
As they rode up to the Factory, and drove past the gates, they were greeted by a man in a long lab coat, with thick glasses and short, brown hair. "Hi, Kids! I'm sure you're all excited for the tour! Oh, don't let me see those sad faces. By the end, I'll let you taste some of our unreleased products that have twice the flavor of our current snacks! Come on, let me show you all around!" The man spoke, opening two large doors to the Factory.
131.title: Candy (Whose belly WOULDN'T grow from that?)

choices: Lisa began to get a tummy ache.
1311.content:
During the Tour, Lisa wandered off from the ground in search of candy. She wasn't about to wait through some boring tour, she was going to find the goodies herself.
She eventually ended up in front of a large metal door, that read "AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY." She was curious, and managed to sneak in when one of the scientists opened the door. Inside, there was a large complex of computers, simulations and other such devices. "Well, well. Looks like we have a little Nosey-nancy. Well, you know what we do to Nosey-nancy's?" A large man appeared behind Lisa, and picked her up and plopped her in a metal reclining chair. A tube fell from the sky, and Lisa felt the metal cylinder slip into her mouth. She then heard an activation noise, pouring thick chocolate fudge into her stomach. She enjoyed this for the most part, and felt her belly expand larger... and larger...
"Are you actually... enjoying this? No! This is punishment!" He then doubles the speed and increase the amount chugged into Lisa's throat.
1311.title: During the Tour

choices: We need a new Candy Tester, and you might just have the appetite to fit the role
I want you to have this untested product that can possibly help you eat more.
1312.content:
"...Alright, now with that out of the way, who wants to eat some of our delicious candy?" The man asked, but his answer was many kids cheering and running towards the tasting room. Inside, there were piles upon piles of Candy Bars, Gummy Worms, Caramel Apples and Popcorn, Chips, Lollipops and so much more!
Lisa was probably the first to go crazy, and she ate and ate and ate. She was so busy eating, that she hadn't realized her belly protruding out from under her dress, and growing with each bite.
Soon, she had finished with a gigantic pile of Candy, that was almost half the size of the room they were in, and her belly was very much visible. "Oooh... I'm so full..." Lisa moaned. She patted her belly, sending ripples through the fat with each slap. "I see you've enjoyed yourself." The man tells Lisa. Lisa blushes, "Yeah... I don't get many opportunities to just binge and go crazy. Whoof, this is gonna be difficult to explain to Mom..." Lisa acknowledges, sighing at her big gut.
The man looks behind him, and then tells Lisa...
1312.title: After the Tour

13121.content:
"We need a new Candy Tester, and you might just have the appetite for the Job. It's 12 Hours a day, and all it is is just eating Candy all day. What do you say?"
Lisa was ecstatic. "Of course! I mean, I like School and all, but to have a job just eating candy? That'd be the best!"

Lisa didn't tell her parents when she left, she just ran out the door at 7:00 and rushed to the Factory. "Ah, Lisa! Glad you could make it. I hope you brought stretchy clothing." The man joked, he chuckled, but then said, "But seriously, your clothes might rip off if you eat too much, and we'd just like to say we're not monitoring you. IF that makes you feel better." Lisa nodded awkwardly, and he brought Lisa to her Workspace. It was a giant, white room, with no visible ceiling or walls. Just a white space.
"Hour 1 - Candy Bars. Please stand in the middle of the room."
Lisa complied, and a giant pile of Candy Bars fell from the sky.
"Eat as many Candy Bars as you can within the Hour. Begin."
Lisa dug right in, and devoured all the Candy Bars one by one, then two by two, then she just ended up cramming them all into her mouth.
But it ended as quickly as it started. She only had a few more Bars left when a voice over the intercom roared,
"Hour 1 - Finished. Results:
Start: 6,000 Candy Bars.
End: 10 Candy Bars.
Approx. Weight Gain: 2,500+ Pounds.
Hour 2 - Milkshake Pump."
A large nozzle fell from the sky and into Lisa's mouth.
"Breath through nose for simple breathing. Begin."
Lisa complied once more, and allowed the thick triple chocolate with sprinkles Milkshake flow down her mouth. At this point, her red dress was destroyed, and now she was just sitting there in her underwear. However, she didn't care much. She enjoyed herself too much to care. She drank and drank, until the Intercom roared again:
"Hour 2 - Finished. Results:
Start: 1,000 Gallons of Super-Thick Triple Chocolate and Sprinkles Milkshake.
End: Empty Vat of Super-Thick Triple Chocolate and Sprinkles Milkshake.
Approx. Weight Gain: 8,000 Pounds.
Hour 3..."
13121.title: We need a new Candy Tester, and you might just ...

131212.content:
"Hour 12 - Finished.
Start: 10,000,000 Cupcakes.
End: 20 Cupcakes.
Approx. Weight Gain: 200,000+ Pounds.

Final Weight: 25,410,329,100,000
We will see you tomorrow."

Lisa was gigantic. Weighing over 1 Trillion pounds, she was completely immobile and couldn't get out. "Um.. Help? Someone?" Lisa called out.
"Ah, Lisa! I see you're still as hungry as ever. Well, seeing as you've made no attempt to leave-" The man talks over the intercom. "It's because I can't move at all!" Lisa yells. "-I suppose we'll give you some Overtime work. Bring in the cakes!"
"Bonus Hours - Supergain Cakes.
Until an authorized personnel stops this, you will be fed with very fattening cakes. Do not struggle."

"Why are *Mpph* are you *Mrph* doing this?" Lisa tries to ask, cakes being forced into her mouth.
"You see, Lisa, I don't want you to test my Candy. I want you to get rid of it. I knew if I found the hungriest, most sugar-happy kid in Springfield, they'd obviously say yes. Who'd say 'No' to free candy? Anyway, I hope you enjoy your eternity of extreme obesity. Oh, and for the record, this room is happy to allow you to keep you gaining for as long as it takes. How much candy do I need gone, well... that would ruin the surprise. I'll let you guess." He would shut off the intercom, and the cakes fell from the sky, into Lisa's mouth. "Well... I suppose if I can't beat him..." She then begins to devour each and every cake, Pie, and other treat that falls from the sky, each one causing her stomach, and body, to grow rapidly.
131212.title: Skip to the end.

choices: She would go off an find more delicious food to eat.
She would take the third bite.
13122.content:
"For your efforts, I'd like you to be Test Subject 1 for our newest Candy Bar: The Neverfull Bar! One bite will cause you to be constantly hungry, always wanting more. A second bite will increase the weight gained per bite of food double, and a third bite, well... you'll never be skinny again, and gain tons of weight in an instant. After that, we're not sure. So we want you to eat this at your home, and take exactly 2 bites. After that, you'll want to find the most fattening foods you can find in your house, and gobble them up. After that, weigh yourself, and record it. Finally, take the third bite, and record how much weight you gain, and tell your parents to send it to me via mailbox." The man explained. Lisa agreed, and ran home with the Neverfull Bar.

She did as the Man said, and took 2 bites. Her stomach began to ache horribly, so, as per instructions, she grabbed the leftover cupcakes from the failed school bake sale last week, and devoured them all. She noticed her belly hanging and protruding from her dress. She was still very hungry, so she grabbed everything from the fridge, and began to eat, eat and eat.

About 2 hours later, she had gained around 230 pounds. Adding that up to her previous binge, she was around 800 pounds. However, her bellowing gut called for more. She decided, after a painful 5 second thinking process, that...
13122.title: I want you to have this untested product that c...

131221.content:
She waddled off as fast as she could, her red dress barely covering up her chest. She ran for what seemed like hours, until she finally found a All-you-can-eat Desserts Bar that just opened up. She ran in, and found out that Children eat free. So she made a thousand sundaes, ate hundreds of oreo's and cookies, gobbled up the cupcakes and regular cakes, and the double weight gain was taking it's effect rather nicely. She had gained over 1,200 pounds, and was still going. People stood around Lisa, cheering her on. However, while she was eating, the Candy Bar accidentally fell out, and she took a bite out of it. The Third Bite. At that moment, her stomach began to rumble loudly, and her body sprung outwards and upwards, her weight tripling multiple times, "ooggghhh..." Lisa moaned, as her body broke through the building and was still going. Lisa had put in a Hose, directly leading to the Milkshake Dispenser, so her weight was continuing to grow.
When it finally stopped, Lisa was at a whopping...
131221.title: She would go off an find more delicious food to...

choices: The next day, Lisa wants more burgers.
Few days later, Lisa has gotten quite fat.
A week later, Lisa is quite huge.
133.content:
Lisa walked around the streets of Springfield like she usually does. Same places, same people, everything was the same. As walked down the road, she had a strong feeling that hit her gut. Hunger. It was pass lunch time and she haven't ate since this morning.

"Huh. I guess am pretty hungry. Now what to eat." Lisa said looking for a good restaurant. Lisa was a vegetarian now, so finding vegetarian food that was actually good was hard for her. However, she was near Krusty Burger and look at a poster on the window. "New Krusty Veggie Burger. 100% Organic and Vegetarian. Ooooooh!" Said a curious Lisa.

Lisa goes into the restaurant and orders one. Took a few minutes, but her burger was finally ready.

"One Krusty Veggie Burger." Said the cashier.
"Thank you." Lisa said giving the cashier her money.

She open up the wrapper around the burger and took a bite. To her, it was delicious. It was one of the best things she every had. "Wow! This is really good." Lisa said. "I can defiently eat more of these." With that said, Lisa asked for two more veggie burgers on the go for later. She payed the cashier and was on her way home with her veggie burgers in her bag.
133.title: Veggie Burgers

1333.content:
After about a week of eating Veggie Burgers every day, Lisa had gained over 200 pounds, thanks to how fattening Krustburger makes their food.
She had noticed this gain, but didn't really mind it. She loved the burgers too much to just give them up, so much in fact, that she'd started eating more regularly.

It was Bart who noticed this addiction and gain some time after Lisa did, and Bart had a plan to take advantage of this, as a prank.
"Hey, Lis!" Bart patted his sister on the back, as she finished up a second Veggie Burger.
"Yeah, Bart?" Lisa responded, mouth still full.
"I know how much you love those Veggie Burgers, so I thought I'd be a nice brother. I got you a coupon for a 1 for 1 deal at Krustyburger, meaning that if you buy one Veggie Burger, you'll get a second free! So that means if you bought, say, 5 burgers, you'd get an extra 5 on top of it! But it's only good for this month, and a week in next month." Bart explained.
Lisa was ecstatic, and thanked Bart.
"Wait.." Lisa said, mid celebration, "How'd you get this coupon?"
"Well..." Bart said, remembering back how he tricked them into giving him the coupon instead of him suing for the "Dangerous Food", which Bart had pretended made him ill in order to scam out the restaurant.
"It's not important. Just go enjoy yourself." Bart said.

Lisa squealed giddily, and ran off to use the coupon.

When Lisa reached Krustburger, she bought...
1333.title: A week later, Lisa is quite huge.

14.content: Alright. Which two should we combine for the pleasure of doing so?
14.title: A Combination of The Two

choices: She is given "low-fat" foods and drinks to try out.
The more she eats, the larger she gets, no matter how small the meal!
141.content: Now for a story. Here's a few you could pick from:
141.title: Inflation & Weight Gain

choices: Fast Food-type Vegan Meal courtesy of Dr. Frink.
1411.content: Well, this should be interesting. What could she have eaten that seemed like such but instead made her grow and grow?
1411.title: So Much for Low-Fat

info.brief_description: Lisa Simpson goes on several adventures of expansion and growth with her friends & family!
info.description:
Welcome to the Lisa Simpson Expansion story. This is an interactive dedicated to the expansion of Lisa Simpson and her family & friends from Springfield, [insert state name here]... but mainly Lisa.

Expansions can include but are not limited too.

Weight Gain
Inflation
Blueberry
Pregnancy
Clothing Inflation
Vore

Most types of expansions are allowed but there are a few rules.

No killing characters.
No sex.
New chapters must add to the story and advance the plot in some way. One or two line chapters will be edited or removed unless they are extra options that could not fit in a previous chapter due to the limited number of choices allowed in an interactive on this site.
New chapters must have at least something to do with the option that they where added too. No spam please.
Please make an effort to actually describe what's going on rather than just saying "Something happened, then something else happened. Then this happened." This is especially true for the transformations themselves, after all that's part of what makes an interactive great seeing other peoples takes on various expansions. No ending chapters without a good reason. If your going to put an end in the story be sure to tie up all or at least most of the loose ends before you do. Seriously, if it's an end let it be a natural end to the story arc not just BANG! END! For no reason.
Limited swearing please. Please keep to the age rating.
Other than that pretty much anything goes, so what are you waiting for? Get in there and blow up the red-dressed girl and the others!
